Method Detail

getCredentialDescription

String getCredentialDescription()
Describes the type of credentials that should be provided. Typically this is just informational to allow a user to know that they can meet the requirements for authentication.

getEnvironment

Map<String,?> getEnvironment()
                             throws IOException
Use this method to gain access to the map prior to calling getConnector() so that it can be augmented with any additional parameters.

Throws:
IOException

setEnvironment

void setEnvironment(Map<String,Serializable> env)
                    throws IOException
Throws:
IOException

getConnector

JMXConnector getConnector()
                          throws MalformedURLException,
                                 IOException
Creates a JMXConnector for local use. The environment returned by getEnvironment() is used to create the connector. That environment can be augmented as needed to complete the required information for making the connection back to the server.

It is anticipated that the classloader for this JMXConnector instance will contain any additional classes needed to resolve the JMXConnector. This method sets the context class loader to the class loader of the current class.

Throws:
MalformedURLException
IOException

getConnector

JMXConnector getConnector(ClassLoader ctxld)
                          throws MalformedURLException,
                                 IOException
Creates a JMXConnector for local use. The environment returned by getEnvironment() is used to create the connector. That environment can be augmented as needed to complete the required information for making the connection back to the server.

Parameters:
ctxld - the context class loader to use for resolving the connector.
Throws:
MalformedURLException
IOException
